title: Rambutan
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Rambutan |cost=? |weight=1 }} {{flavour|A small but delicious fruit. Not very filling.}} A '''rambutan''' is a fruit which normally provides 600 [[nutrition]]. '''Carnivore'''

Rank 3. 1,200. ==History== In [[0.15]], all fruits and vegetables were condensed into the universal "[[fruit]]" item.
